16_1KAKF4nVCWqJbrVPWxFvRNuU1zLkwVtC8L.body:
i always try to leave minimum footprint and what remains try to put for recycling

Almost all plastic in the ocean comes from just 10 rivers - "The Yangtze, the Indus, Yellow River, Hai River, the Nile, the Ganges, Pearl River, Amur River, the Niger, and the Mekong (in that order)" [src](http://www.dw.com/en/almost-all-plastic-in-the-ocean-comes-from-just-10-rivers/a-41581484)

I heard the burning of the waste/garbage can cause "bad for health" particles in air. In my country the factories who burn the waste has some filters that can capture it. BEST way not to hurt planet is NOT TO BUY things that contains hard to recycle waste and focus on reuse of the waste.
